resources.string: %1$s v%2$d by Arno den Hond Â© 2016
This app only provides a launcher shortcut to show the instructions below.

Send Text to any app that can send text.
This app can be used in two ways:

Select text in any app that you want to send to another app.
From the floating text selection toolbar overflow menu select SendText.
Select your destination and the app will appear with your text pre-filled.

Edit the Quick Settings Tiles and add SendText
Select the SendText Tile and paste or type the text in the notification.
Select your destination and the app will appear with your text pre-filled.
Press back to close this screen.
Launcher disabled. Restart required on some devices.
